name: frontend
description: ## File structure ``` |   index.html |   .gitignore |   package.json |   README.md | +---css |   |   conversation.css | +---js |   |   apiHandler.js |   |   conversation.js |   |   init.js |   |   panel.js |   |   services.js | ```

scripts.deploy:prod: firebase use --add growthfile-207204 && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.uglify: uglifyjs dist/v2/js/compiled.js -o dist/v2/js/bundle.min.js -c -m && uglifyjs dist/v2/js/apiHandler.js -o dist/v2/js/apiHandler.js -c -m && rm dist/v2/js/compiled.js
scripts.uglify-w: uglifyjs dist/v2/js/compiled.js -o dist/v2/js/bundle.min.js -c -m && uglifyjs dist/v2/js/apiHandler.js -o dist/v2/js/apiHandler.js -c -m && remove-node-modules dist/v2/js/compiled.js
scripts.compile: npm run clean && npm run babel && npm run worker  && npm run uglify && npm run build-css
scripts.compile-w: npm run cleanjs && npm run cleancss && npm run babel && npm run worker  && npm run uglify-w && npm run build-css
